data.text: Worst experience, Rooms are dirty, In Breakfast we have to wait at least 10min per counter too crowded than the capacity. Rude behaviour and no courtesy by the hotel team. Even after several followups, no action taken by their team.
data.title: One word - Bad experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear vamykrishnam,
We are delighted that you had a great experience with us.
We acknowledge that a few aspects of your stay were less than satisfactory and appreciate that you have taken the time to provide us with this feedback. Please accept our most humble apologies for these shortfalls.
Your comments have been shared with the concerned departments and corrective actions will be implemented.
It has been a pleasure having you as our distinguished guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.
Kind Regards, 
Hyatt Regency Dubai and Galleria
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Galleria

data.text: Everyone is kind and the place is comfortable.. lately it is loud as they put a number of a family in one apartment with kids so that will make them loud and reckless.. The house keeping is perfect with cleaning a guy named Ahmed he is so kind .. yet the engineers are slow to answer
data.title: The house keeping is perfect with cleaning a guy named Ahmed he is so kind .. yet the engineers are slow to answer

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Laith A,
We are delighted that you had a great experience with us.

Your comments have been shared with the concerned departments and corrective actions will be implemented to further improve our service and ensure similar incidents are not repeated in the future.
It has been a pleasure having you as our distinguished guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

data.text:
We had a wonderful experience, the staff are amazing and extremely accommodating, the rooms were clean and very comfortable.
Both check-in and check-out were professionally handled and easy.

We had a great experience; we highly recommend this hotel.
data.title: Recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ItsmeAnn_14,
Thank you for taking the time to write this review.
We are delighted that you had a great experience with us. 
We will certainly share your comments with the team who would be happy to receive such positive feedback.
It has been a pleasure having you as our distinguished guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.
Warm Regards,
Hyatt Regency Dubai and Galleria
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Galleria

data.text: Mohamed, the housekeeper, has a lovely smile and is helpful.  He takes care of any problems in the room as soon as he notices them.  I can't speak English very well, so they've been very helpful and I've been able to spend my time there comfortably.  thank you.
data.title: He is kind and polite in his work.

data.text: Very good hotel, restaurant, ambiance, rooms etc all well organised. Only what I felt reservation link reply very poor. If you send a query on provided link never expect reply, only way that you has to book online platform. Management should improve this glitch.
data.title: raptureholidays247@gmail.com

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Companion65691836641,
Thank you for taking the time to write this review.
I appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention, and please accept our heartfelt apologies for any trouble this has caused you.Please email your concern to our reservations team at reservations.hyattregencydubai@hyatt.com
Someone from the reservations team will be happy to assist you further.
Your comments have been shared with the concerned departments and corrective actions will be implemented to further improve the service.
Sincere regards,
Hyatt Regency Dubai and Galleria
